taladid.com is a 3 in 1 automated QR code SAAS script maker for a digital business card (electronic Name card) , an email signature and a short social profiles ! It is an easy way to share your contacts and grow your business & professional relationships just a finger tip SCAN & SAVE to your mobile contacts or SCAN & SHARE during your online meeting!

Free 1 year trial for the member from here Thxs We are inviting you try us at https://taladid.com

stories.text:
I don't think this is random luck

Whenever I search heads or tails I get tails if I haven't searched heads or tails in the last hour or so.

1 or 2 month ago it was heads all the time

Does anyone know what could be causing that?

Could it be because of the /dev/random values in a VM image that they always revert back to?

it's nothing important really, but I'm curious
stories.title: Tell HN: Whenever I search Heads or Tails on Google, I get tails the first time

stories.text:
I'm not asking how to use NoCode or LowCode tools, I'm asking how do you make a NoCode/LowCode interface for any tool?

For a web application, is it just using JavaScript to drag-dropping divs/images that represent certain actions that get converted to actual code behind the scenes?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you make a NoCode/LowCode application?
